text: good afternoon
Good afternoon
how are you doing today?
Great and you?
great, thank you. do you donate to any charities?
Yes, a couple times out of the year.
that is really great. have you heard of save the children?
Yes, I've seen commercials. I normally donate to the SPCA
I do love the SPCA also. but supporting children is so important. would you be willing to donate some of your task winnings today to save the children?
I totally agree and  I would love too!
that is so great. you can donate anything from $0-$2 and it'll come right from your earnings. how much would you like to do today?
I would be willing to give $1
that is a great donation. it will help the children so much.
I truly believe so too. Is that the charity you give to?
I do, among others, most of which involve children. I just can't help myself. They dont deserve to suffer.
I agree. I think I will look into adding this to what I donate during the year.
it is certainly a great one, they really make sure the money goes where its needed vs in someone's pockets from the charity.
That it something I would like to be apart of!
great! well thank you for your donation today! that $1 will really help so much.
You're welcome and thank you!
